alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 1:28AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dale and southeastern Coffee Counties through 200 AM CST... At 128 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of New Brockton, or 7 miles southwest of Enterprise, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dill, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Lucile, Gerald, Turner Crossroads, Central City, Clintonville and Ewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
